application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to the partial discharge of Condition 36(iv) (Contamination - Imported Soil Testing for Blocks E and F) of Planning Permission 73955/APP/2022/2613. Section 73 application to vary Conditions 2, 3 and 5 of application reference 73955/APP/2021/3362 dated 20-01-2022 (Section 73 application to vary Conditions 2 and 3 of application reference 73955/APP/2020/139 (Demolition of existing buildings for residential-led mixed use development comprising buildings between 3 and 11 storeys to provide residential units (Use Class C3) and ground floor employment floorspace (Use Class B1) with associated access and car and cycle parking, landscape and amenity areas and associated servicing) to link internal corridors, relocate the consented gym use, relocate a duplex unit, change duplex units to single level, amend the refuse strategy and amend the layout of the car park & cycle stores) to include a second staircase, reduction in car parking, change to energy strategy, internal flat changes to address fire regulations, change to residential unit mix, and amendments to landscaping.
decision_conditions: The submitted details are acceptable in discharging the requirements of Part (iv) of Condition of planning permission 73955/APP/2022/2613 for Blocks E and F of the development only as defined within drawing numbers: 1140CTC-FRA-ZZ-01-DR-A-010102 Rev P01; 1140CTC-FRA-ZZ-01-DR-A-010103 Rev P01; 1140CTC-FRA-ZZ-02-DR-A-010104 Rev P01; 1140CTC-FRA-ZZ-03-DR-A-010105 Rev P01; 1140CTC-FRA-ZZ-RF-DR-A-010112 Rev P01; 1140CTC-FRA-ZZ-00-DR-A-010101 Rev P01; accompanying non-material amendment application 73955/APP/2025/604. and the condition is therefore discharged in part. Further details are required in order to discharge the requirements of Part (iv) of Condition of planning permission 73955/APP/2022/2613 for all subsequent phases of the development.
